channel.title: CVE Feed for ManageEngine -- OpManager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ManageEngine -- OpManager

item.title: CVE-2023-47211|2024-08-02T21:01:22.684Z -- manageengine -- opmanager
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the uploadMib functionality of ManageEngine OpManager 12.7.258. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary file creation. An attacker can send a malicious MiB file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-6748|2024-08-01T21:41:04.605Z -- manageengine -- opmanager
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine OpManager, OpManager Plus, OpManager MSP and RMM versions 128317 and below are vulnerable to authenticated SQL injection in the URL monitoring.

item.title: CVE-2024-6748|2024-07-29T20:22:16.154Z -- manageengine -- opmanager
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine OpManager, OpManager Plus, OpManager MSP and RMM versions 128317 and below are vulnerable to authenticated SQL injection in the URL monitoring.

item.title: CVE-2024-36038|2024-06-24T13:18:16.339Z -- manageengine -- opmanager
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ITOM products versions from 128234 to 128248 are affected by the stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in the proxy server option.

item.title: CVE-2024-36038|2024-06-24T11:45:11.075Z -- manageengine -- opmanager
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ITOM products versions from 128234 to 128248 are affected by the stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in the proxy server option.
